name: Colors + Shapes
description:
The objective of the game is to match the color & shape in the bottom right corner with the scrolling & bouncing objects in the game board. When you match correctly you will be awarded with 1 to 3 points depending on the game speed. If you match wrongly you will loose equal point. You have to match 10 times to go to next level. There are more than 2000 levels to play and enjoy.

Swip left or right to change level. Swipe Up to display menu.
